title: The Fifth Survivor: Wet Dreams
description: Hotshot vigilante, George and his gorgeous sidekick Elaine are thrust together into a video game nightmare that will either see them end filthy rich… or dead.While the evil Hybrid Corporation seeks to further its world-ending plans, George and Elaine must escape a video game haunted house filled with sexy chicks who think he’s their king. As he'll find out though, he knows these fine women rather well. There's more to these seductive women than he first believes. They are victims of the evil Hybrid Corp and this whole haunted house thing is a trap. One that might see George and Elaine join the countless other victims of the evil company. Sexy Zombie female killers, male vigilante badassery, video game b grade zombie shock lunacy! Come join the fun.  Contains sexy scenes with naughty words, lots of blood and gore, gun violence, knife violence, one instance of pogo stick violence and drool-worthy women who roleplay the gals of your wildest male dreams.In other words… Kids go home. Everyone else, welcome to the party!
author: Angel Ramon
